name: Elements of Alma: Shades of Tragedy
name_original: Elements of Alma: Shades of Tragedy
description:
Prelude Chapter:

The Central Nation of Axandrum, has taken it's holy crusade against the Southern Nation of Uhdaga. Abdollius, the current ruling king of Axandrum.
Has attempted to maintain peace for all the nations of Hal'Veshja, yet he feels Uhdaga and their cruel practices are consider taboo to the creators, the Arcus.
Abdollius has ruled that in order for the "Promise Day" to be that of peace and long life. That Uhdaga and their practices must be put to a stop.
Declaring an all out war with Uhdaga, 3 years after. Axandrum finds it's self at the mercy of it's own homeland threats. Bandits, Cults, and Fiend Tribes all begin 
to rise up and make their move to take down the Crown City and it's King.

Abdollius left with few soldiers to defend the Crown City, was left with only once choice. To assemble his most elite of soldiers, his Elite Court. 
made up of five of his most trusted and hand pick counsel. Abdollius has task them with maintaining the peace and order of the homeland, while
handling other political affairs. Just as they were task their duties, a commoner presents to them a rare artifact that was long believed lost to 
mankind. The artifact could be used to rewrite the world to what ever the user desires, Abdollius against the use of the artifact demands that 
it be sealed away in the Castles Vault. As the Elite Court members take on their most notorious threat, the fiend tribe of Norgons. They are
presented with an even greater threat. The presence of Dark Artifacts, these forbidden artifacts have given their foes the upper hand.
While a mysterious ritual link to the artifacts has been discovered. They must act fast to put an end to the ritual or be at the mercy of 
it's caster and it's power..
